course: Bachelor of Science in Information Technology
description: STI College, formerly known as Systems Technology Institute, is the largest network of for-profit information technology based colleges in the Philippines. This is where I learned programming and slowly become addicted to developing applications and designing. I also learned about MySQL, JavaScript, HTML, C#, and more. During my time in college, I specialized in .NET Application using C#. Here I learned about the importance of OOP, user experience, and design.
